DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 : ROUND OF 16 ; SPOTLIGHT ; HE DOESN ' T SERVE WHEN HE SITS , WAITS
DOC.TEXT: Hugo Sanchez , aging player on Mexico ' s team who didn ' t play against Bulgaria in his team ' s round-of-16 elimination by penalty shots and wasn ' t happy about it , had the following to say about Coach Miguel Mejia Baron ' s decision to keep him on the bench : " What would have happened ( in Argentina ) if Maradona did not play in three World Cup games ? " Shall we call him Humble Hugo ? BILL DWYRE
